content.title: Uses
content.description: The leaves are used to clean cookware and to scour wood. The fruits are edible, but has little flavour.Phytochemicals found in this plant include the Triterpenes: α-amyrin fatty acid ester, α-amyrin acetate, β-amyrin fatty acid ester, β-amyrin acetate, lupeol acetate, and squalene; polyprenol, phytol, β-carotene, lutein, stigmasterol, and sitosterol.
